        Main Constructor for Player Class
        Parameters:
        hp - entity's health
        spd - entity's speed
        delay - delay between actions
        dmg - damage that entity does
        moveable - can the entity move around
        xpIncreaseRate - how much the required XP to level increases after each Level
        attackRange - Range of attacking enemies
